name: Hi-Tech Transcription Services
tag_list: transcription-services, transcription-services-india, auido-transcription-services, interview-transcription, audio-transcription, legal-transcrption, medical-transcription, transcription-company-in-india, online-transcription-services, hipaa-compliant-tra
overview:
Transcription services provider in India for offshore transcribing requirements outsourced by companies, organizations, institutions, business.

Hi-Tech Transcription Services is an India based transcription company founded in 1983 and shown its online presence in year 2008. Having such huge experience in transcription industry has enabled to develop great sense of various industrial transcription requirements and thus helped in the development of proven transcribing process for accurate and quick transcribing solutions.

Dedicated team of most experienced and industrial transcribers are engaged for every project delicately to ensure high quality and great accuracy level with being cost effective for clients.

Having secure, well equipped and hi-tech operational centers in India and various other part of the world adds additional benefits.

Apart from it, transcription solutions are cheaper up to 60% than local transcribing rates across USA, UK, UAE, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Spain, Italy, France, Germany, Singapore etc.

To get more in-depth information on transcription services and benefits offered at Hi-Tech Transcription Services in India, send a brief details of your requirements on info@hitechtranscriptionservices.com
